name: Mr. & Mrs. Smith
summary: A married couple living a mundane life discovers that they are both secret assassins hired to kill each other.

name: Maleficent
summary: A vengeful fairy places a curse on an infant princess but later realizes the child may be the key to her redemption.

name: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider
summary: An adventurous archaeologist must find ancient artifacts before a secret society uses them for world domination.

name: Wanted
summary: A frustrated office worker discovers he is the son of a legendary assassin and is recruited into a secret society of killers.

name: Salt
summary: A CIA officer goes on the run after being accused of being a Russian spy, leading to a high-stakes chase to clear her name.

name: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
summary: A governor's daughter, Elizabeth Swann, is kidnapped by cursed pirates, leading to a daring rescue mission by a blacksmith and a rogue pirate.

name: Pride & Prejudice
summary: A spirited young woman navigates issues of love, class, and family when she encounters the proud and wealthy Mr. Darcy.

name: Atonement
summary: A young girl's false accusation changes the lives of two lovers forever, leading to a tragic tale of love and redemption.

name: The Imitation Game
summary: A brilliant mathematician, Alan Turing, works to break Nazi codes during World War II, with the support of his talented colleague Joan Clarke.

name: Anna Karenina
summary: In imperial Russia, a married aristocrat risks everything when she falls into a passionate affair with a young cavalry officer.

name: Lost in Translation
summary: A lonely, aging movie star and a neglected young woman form an unlikely bond after crossing paths in Tokyo.

name: Black Widow
summary: Natasha Romanoff confronts the darker parts of her past when a dangerous conspiracy linked to her history emerges.

name: Lucy
summary: A woman accidentally gains superhuman abilities and sets out on a journey to unlock the full potential of her brain.

name: Marriage Story
summary: A stage director and his actress wife struggle through a painful divorce that pushes them to their emotional limits.

name: The Avengers
summary: Earth’s mightiest heroes must come together to stop an alien invasion led by Loki, the God of Mischief.

name: Titanic
summary: A young aristocrat falls in love with a kind-hearted artist aboard the ill-fated Titanic.

name: The Reader
summary: A teenager has an affair with an older woman, only to discover years later that she was involved in a Nazi war crime.

name: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
summary: A couple undergoes a procedure to erase each other from their memories, only to realize their love is worth fighting for.

name: Revolutionary Road
summary: A married couple in the 1950s struggles to balance societal expectations with their personal dreams and desires.

name: Steve Jobs
summary: A revealing look at the personal and professional struggles of Apple co-founder Steve Jobs during key moments of his career.

name: The Devil Wears Prada
summary: A young aspiring journalist lands a demanding assistant job at a prestigious fashion magazine, learning the challenges of the industry under a ruthless editor.

name: Interstellar
summary: A team of explorers ventures through a wormhole in search of a new home for humanity, facing love, sacrifice, and the mysteries of space-time.

name: Les Misérables
summary: In 19th-century France, an ex-convict seeks redemption while being pursued by a relentless inspector, amidst a backdrop of revolution and love.

name: The Dark Knight Rises
summary: Batman returns from exile to save Gotham from a ruthless mercenary, with the help of a mysterious and skilled cat burglar.

name: The Princess Diaries
summary: A shy teenager discovers she's the heir to a European throne and must navigate royal responsibilities while balancing her normal life.

name: Black Swan
summary: A dedicated ballerina’s obsession with perfection spirals into madness as she prepares for the lead role in 'Swan Lake.'

name: Léon: The Professional
summary: A young girl is taken in by a professional hitman after her family is murdered, leading to an unlikely mentorship.

name: V for Vendetta
summary: In a dystopian future, a masked vigilante fights against a totalitarian regime with the help of a young woman.

name: Jackie
summary: A biographical drama that explores the life of Jacqueline Kennedy following the assassination of her husband, President John F. Kennedy.

name: Annihilation
summary: A biologist joins an expedition into a mysterious, mutated zone where the laws of nature no longer apply.

name: La La Land
summary: A jazz musician and an aspiring actress fall in love while chasing their dreams in Los Angeles.

name: Easy A
summary: A high school student’s reputation skyrockets after a lie about losing her virginity spreads, leading her to embrace the notoriety.

name: The Help
summary: An aspiring journalist documents the experiences of Black maids working for white families in 1960s Mississippi.

name: Cruella
summary: An ambitious fashion designer embraces her wicked side as she transforms into the infamous Cruella de Vil.

name: Zombieland
summary: A group of survivors navigates a post-apocalyptic world overrun by zombies, following a unique set of survival rules.

name: The Wolf of Wall Street
summary: A stockbroker's rise and fall in a world of corruption, excess, and crime, based on a true story.

name: I, Tonya
summary: The true story of figure skater Tonya Harding and the infamous attack on her rival Nancy Kerrigan.

name: Suicide Squad
summary: A group of dangerous criminals is recruited for a secret government mission to fight an unknown threat.

name: Once Upon a Time in Hollywood
summary: A fading actor and his stunt double navigate Hollywood’s changing landscape in the late 1960s.

name: Barbie
summary: After experiencing an existential crisis, Barbie ventures into the real world, uncovering its joys and flaws.

name: Spider-Man: No Way Home
summary: Peter Parker's identity is revealed, leading him to seek help from Doctor Strange, but a spell goes wrong, unleashing villains from different universes.

name: Dune
summary: A young nobleman must navigate a dangerous desert planet, facing powerful enemies and discovering his destiny in a war over the universe’s most valuable resource.

name: Euphoria
summary: A group of high school students navigate love, identity, addiction, and trauma in this raw and visually stunning drama.

name: The Greatest Showman
summary: The story of P.T. Barnum's journey from a struggling visionary to the creator of a worldwide entertainment sensation.

name: Malcolm & Marie
summary: A filmmaker and his girlfriend return home after a premiere, leading to an intense night of revelations and emotional turmoil.
